short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate secure, random passwords for your accounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate Secure, Random Passwords for Your Accounts

Keep your online accounts safe with strong, randomly generated passwords. This extension helps you generate secure, unique passwords for each of your accounts, ensuring that your personal information stays protected from hackers and breaches.

    Easy to Use: With just one click, generate a strong password for any website or service.
    Customizable: Adjust the length and complexity of the password to meet your needs.
    Secure: Utilizes advanced algorithms to create unguessable passwords.
    One-Click Convenience: Simply click and copy the password to your clipboard.

Don't risk your online security with weak or reused passwords. Use this extension to create the strongest possible passwords, and manage your digital safety with ease.
